meta_table.comment: This table is used to load meta data for all the papers.
meta_table.name: meta_data

refs_table.comment: This table holds the graph of references.
refs_table.name: pcite

map_table.comment: This table holds the map layout positions.
map_table.name: map_data

date_table.comment: If present, this table maps time ordered ids to day boundaries.
date_table.name: datebdry

misc_table.comment: If present, this table holds misc information such as what papers are trending'.
misc_table.name: misc
